attributes.action: After C19 pandemic all NHS wage rise +£1000 bonus, link NHS and MP pay increases
attributes.additional_details: Because during the Covid-19 pandemic we finally realise who keep the country running.
attributes.background: To finally treat all NHS staff as one of the most important workforces in the country, along with police force and firefighters. All frontline staff of Covid19 to get a £1000 bonus at end of pandemic. Link all NHS pay increases to MPs pay increases.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
